input.sentences: the air force unit was lined up and were saluted | as they prepared to take flight .
one of the corporals helped their friend with their uniform before they took off on their plane .
the plane arrived on time and was ready for take off .
the pilots were ready to board the plane .
the pilots boarded the plane to begin their air force training .
output.sentences: The unit was prepared to leave for the mission and turned for a last salute.
Before getting on the plane, one cadet helped another with her uniform.
Finally, the plane was ready and it was time for the new cadets to board the plane along with the seasoned mission-goers.
The plane was fueled and ready and the pilots were anxious to get aloft.
The plane was very reliable as it was even used for training new pilots.
